Package database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class manages the database and provides methods to retrieve groups, lectures, and students from the database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
M.O. Hodkova

  • Method Details

    • setUpConnection

      public static void setUpConnection() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Sets up a connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error working with the database
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found

    • getGroups

      public static List<Group> getGroups()
      Returns a list of all groups in the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all groups

      Returns a list of lectures for a given subject and group.
      Parameters:
      subject - the subject for which to retrieve lectures
      group - the group for which to retrieve lectures
      Returns:
      a list of lectures

    • getStudentLecture

      public static StudentLectureRecord getStudentLecture(Lecture lecture, Student student)
      Retrieves a student lecture record for a specified lecture and student.
      Parameters:
      lecture - the lecture to retrieve the record for
      student - the student to retrieve the record for
      Returns:
      the student lecture record for the specified lecture and student, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error working with the database

    • getHoursOfSkippedLectures

      public static int getHoursOfSkippedLectures(Student student, Subject subject)
      Calculates the hours of skipped lectures for a specified student and subject.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to calculate the skipped hours for
      subject - the subject to calculate the skipped hours for
      Returns:
      the hours of skipped lectures for the specified student and subject
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error working with the database

    • getHoursOfLectures

      public static int getHoursOfLectures(Subject subject, Group group)
      Calculates the hours of lectures for a specified subject and group.
      Parameters:
      subject - the subject to calculate the lecture hours for
      group - the group to calculate the lecture hours for
      Returns:
      the hours of lectures for the specified subject and group
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error working with the database
